The diagram is professionally designed, easy to understand, and has excellent clarity with no watermarks.
llm_score.caption: An illustrative diagram of a home ventilation system incorporating a heat recovery unit. The infographic demonstrates how fresh air is drawn into the house, passing through an air purifier, while stale air from various household activities (such as cooking, showering, and general living) is expelled. A central heat exchanger efficiently recovers thermal energy from the outgoing stale air and transfers it to the incoming fresh air, ensuring that tempered and purified air is circulated throughout the living spaces. The clear arrows and labels highlight the flow of cool stale air, warm stale air, fresh air, and tempered purified air, showcasing an energy-efficient indoor air quality solution.
